MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
DIVISION OF CHILD WELFARE LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB520304693
Licensee Name: Upper Peninsula Family Solutions
Licensee Address: 369 US 41 East
Negaunee, MI 49866
Licensee Telephone #: (906) 228-2267
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Ricky Sanville, Designee
Name of Facility: Upper Peninsula Family Solutions
Facility Address: 369 US 41 East
Negaunee, MI 49866
Facility Telephone #: (906) 273-1095
Capacity: NA
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
P.O. BOX 30650 • LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909-8150
www.michigan.gov • (517) 284-9727

II. Purpose of Addendum
The agency is planning to move their office building from Suite 130, 307 S. Front,
Marquette, MI 49855 to 369 US 41 East in Negaunee, MI 49866 on 06/30/2018.
The Division of Child Welfare Licensing is required to determine compliance with the
following rule:
R 400.12204 Facilities.
(1) An agency shall provide and maintain sufficient office space, equipment, and
supplies to ensure the delivery of services.
(2) An agency shall have physical office space with a Michigan street address.
III. Methodology
A site visit was made by this Licensing Consultant on 06/19/2018.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The new office for Upper Peninsula Family Solutions at 369 US 41 East in
Negaunee, MI 49866 has sufficient office space and equipment to ensure the
delivery of regulated services.
P.O. BOX 30650 • LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909-8150
www.michigan.gov • (517) 284-9727

The size of the rooms are as follows:
Kitchen (009) 297 square feet
Conference (008) 362 square feet
Production (027) 125 square feet
Hall (026) 94 square feet
Office (007) 105 square feet
Storage (025) 48 square feet
Office (024) 103 square feet
Office (023) 106 square feet
Office (022) 102 square feet
Office (021) 101 square feet
Office (020) 102 square feet
Hall (003) 146 square feet
Office (006) 106 square feet
Office (005) 100 square feet
Reception (004) 130 square feet
Entry Hall (002) 135 square feet
Waiting Area (001) 96 square feet
The new facility has 8 offices, a conference room, waiting area, reception and a
kitchen. There is a paved parking lot designed for 20-23 cars. They plan a future
deck off the rear door, which will be 20 feet by 16 feet. The site is comprised of 4
acres, mostly wooded.
There will be a locked filed cabinet in the licensing worker’s office where the CHRI
will be stored, office doors lock and there will be a storage room with a lock on
it. There will be a cross shredder in the production room.
V. Recommendation
Based on the on-site inspection and provided documentation, the agency’s new offices
are in compliance with Rule 204 (1) and (2).
06/20/2018
